content.raw: Since instructions are designed to be followed one by one I would like to maintain the numbered list unless we have a good reason to change it. The format used for the code blocks have changed from spacing the commands to use three backticks. I don’t have a strong preference but the rest of the document should be changed according or the use of three backticks reverted.
